text: Mount Moriah is an American folk band consisting of lead vocalist Heather "H.C." McEntire, guitarist Jenks Miller, and bassist Casey Toll. ==Discography== *Mount Moriah (2011, Holidays For Quince Records) *Miracle Temple (2013, Merge Records) *How To Dance (2016, Merge Records) ==References== Category:Musical groups established in 2011
title: Mount Moriah (band)
